job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: This position is a great opportunity for an entrepreneurially-minded person who enjoys making a difference in a start-up environment. Looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to both create and extend existing models.Â ResponsibilitiesBuild, extend, deploy, maintain, and troubleshoot machine learning solutions to help drive business metrics. Collaborate with analytics and data teams to optimize machine learning model performance and data pipelines.Ensure our relevancy in the field of machine learning by staying up to date on the latest ML techniques and become the subject matter expert within the company.Develop solutions to complex problems without considerable technical direction.Â Qualifications and Experience2-4 years of experience as a machine learning engineer or data scientistExperience with developing software in object-oriented programming languages, including Python, Scala, Java, or C++Experience with machine learning tools, including Tensorflow, Pytorch, or Scikit LearnProven and demonstrated experience with data preparation, building, scaling, and optimizing machine learning solutionsSelf-driven, organized, reliable and determined team playerThinks analytically and solves complex problems within a team structureFlexible and able to adapt to new processes and requirements in a dynamic environmentStrong, clear and concise written and verbal communication skillsAdvocates for innovation and drives change through persuasion and consensusTranslates issues/problems into solutions with tangible changes that improve the team or the organization***Unfortunately, this position does not offer work sponsorshipÂ at this time***Keywords: machine learning, ML, engineering, data science, programming, models, modeling, python, tools, data, building, deploying, scaling, troubleshooting, maintaining, strategy
